title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4212.7 - Safety helmet required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4212.7 - Safety helmet required

State Regulations

Every jockey, apprentice jockey and other rider, whether
in a race or when exercising or ponying a quarter horse, shall wear a safety
helmet of a type approved in writing by the stewards; and no change shall be
made in any such helmet without the approval of the stewards. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4212.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
